document_data.name: Lances of Leilon
document_data.mainbody: The '''Lances of Leilon''' was a group of soldiers that defended the town of [[Leilon]].
document_data.Organization: This force of about 200 men was always on patrol trying to minimize [[orc]]s and [[goblin]]s in the area.
document_data.Possessions: The Lances of Leilon were skilled at firing [[crossbow]]s from horseback. While clad in [[chain mail]], each lancer carried a [[shield]]. In battle, they fought with [[lance]]s, [[light crossbow]]s, [[sword]]s, [[axe]]s, and [[dagger]]s.
